## SyncBaseType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SyncBaseType = {
    operation: string;
    changes?: {
        local?: FileChanges;
        remote?: FileChanges;
    };
    conflicts: AcceptedConflicts;
    commits?: {
        local?: CommitInfo[];
        remote?: CommitInfo[];
    };
};
```
